name: Luxuria Superbia
description: A simple game of touch, pleasure and joy.Luxuria Superbia is a colorful, musical journey made to fill you with joy. Exciting designs explode from your touch as you glide through playful stylized flowers. It’s all about the experience and the interaction.There’s twelve flower-like tunnels and a garden with a temple.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 500 MB RAM Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce or Radeon Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I think I just had sex with my computer. It thanked me afterwards.

Luxuria Superbia is an acid trip the likes of which I have never seen before. It is an incredibly simple game about... I don't know what, but it's really fun. All the player does is use their mouse to create color by clicking on certain parts of the screen. It's fun comes from the fact that we were all once five years old. It feels like a step back into childhood with it's vibrant colors and simplicity. I've only played for a short time, but this is a fantastic game.  On the OTHER hand, the game has on mechanic that kind of ruins the immersion. The flowers. The game has you going through tunnels wich are describing as being flowers. That concept is easy to understand, except the player appears to be doing... something to the flowers. If the player creates enough color (Or, as the game describes it, 'create joy'), the flower begins to talk, saying somewhat creepy things like, 'Grip my petals' and 'Oh yes, yes'. I'm not into ****ing a flower am I?  That portion of the game DOES contribute to the feel of the game, since the creator so obviously intended that. The game is playable by both children and adults, for the simple reason that children who don't understand what the flowers are getting at won't care, and the children who do are likely doing something age-inappropriate anyways, and still don't care.  Overall, creepy, but fun. 9/10 because I feel like I just gave a flower a handjob. I'm going to see if my shower can burn away the dirtiness I feel afer playing this. Then I'm going to play it again. Why? Because ♥♥♥♥ it, I like pretty colors.
